channel.title: Different walking emote when wielding?
channel.description:
ok..heres the situation..i have a ring, and whenever the person puts on the ring the way he walks, attacks, stands, and blocks changes.
how can i set it up to when the ring is being wielded i can change the emote id to the way he attacks, stands, walks and blocks? i have the ids for the emotes and ring..i just dont know how to do it..

item.title: Different walking emote when wielding?
item.dc:creator: @jmaldon jmaldon
item.description:
@jmaldon wrote:

so would it be like this to make him walk different when the ring is wielded? i have tried it but there is no change.

public int GetWalkAnim(int id) { if(playerEquipment[playerRing] == 1637) { return 79; } .....

Read full topic
